net.bytebuddy.implementation.auxiliary

类 TypeProxy.ForSuperMethodByConstructor

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bytebuddy.implementation.auxiliary.TypeProxy.ForSuperMethodByConstructor
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    StackManipulation
    封闭类:
    TypeProxy

    public static class TypeProxy.ForSuperMethodByConstructor
extends Object
implements StackManipulation
    Loads a type proxy onto the operand stack which is created by calling one of its constructors. When this stack manipulation is applied, an instance of the instrumented type must lie on top of the operand stack. All constructor parameters will be assigned their default values when this stack operation is applied.

    • 嵌套类概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ForSuperMethodByConstructor

        public ForSuperMethodByConstructor(TypeDescription proxiedType,
                                   Implementation.Target implementationTarget,
                                   List<TypeDescription> constructorParameters,
                                   boolean ignoreFinalizer,
                                   boolean serializableProxy)
        Creates a new stack operation for creating a type proxy by calling one of its constructors.
        参数:
        proxiedType - The type for the type proxy to subclass or implement.
        implementationTarget - The implementation target this type proxy is created for.
        constructorParameters - The parameter types of the constructor that should be called.
        ignoreFinalizer - true if any finalizers should be ignored for the delegation.
        serializableProxy - Determines if the proxy should be serializable.

    • 方法详细资料

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        从接口复制的说明: StackManipulation
        Determines if this stack manipulation is valid.
        指定者:
        isValid 在接口中 StackManipulation
        返回:
        If false, this manipulation cannot be applied and should throw an exception.

      • apply

        public StackManipulation.Size apply(MethodVisitor methodVisitor,
                                    Implementation.Context implementationContext)
        从接口复制的说明: StackManipulation
        Applies the stack manipulation that is described by this instance.
        指定者:
        apply 在接口中 StackManipulation
        参数:
        methodVisitor - The method visitor used to write the method implementation to.
        implementationContext - The context of the current implementation.
        返回:
        The changes to the size of the operand stack that are implied by this stack manipulation.
